title: LL makee a FAQ!
content:
Yes, I've decided to make a real long boring and drawn out FAQ for the entire Keen series. This will be a FAQ with a difference though; we already know all the basic stuff, like storylines, installation, SGA and such, what I want is for you to submit all those little questions you've always wondered about like 'How the heck did pizza get to Mars, and what does it taste like?' 'Why do those littl scot guys in K5 have no arms?' and 'What keeps the points up in the air?'

No question to odd or too stupid, I shall answer them all!

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Mod2.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: LL makee a FAQ!
content: I have a project a bit like this in my mind. I've coded the system but haven't started adding content. It's not this kind of FAQ thing, though. Good luck!Eat your veggies!

title: Re: LL makee a FAQ!
content:

title: Answer Me!!!
content:
Heheheh!!! "No question to stupid, or hard"

Muahahaha!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

For starters... answer these: [quote]Quote:[hr]'How the heck did pizza get to Mars, and what does it taste like?' 'Why do those littl scot guys in K5 have no arms?[[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-korath.gif[/img] ]' and 'What keeps the points up in the air?'[hr][/quote]

And... a few origional:

1) Are the dounuts in K4 from Dunkin Doughnuts, Honey Dipped Doughnuts, or some other brand?

2) Is three-tooth lake really named after trident gum? I mean... a whole lake dedicated to that chewy, and delicous bubble gum?

3) Why is keen's shirt red in Keen GBC edition (was his pink shirt in the wash)?

4) Does Commander Keen play any instruments (Musical, not instruments of tortore, death... just music)?

5) Is this smiley the result of an affair between Sonic's daughter, and keen - [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img] ?

6) Who is this smiley supposed to be - [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rasta.gif[/img] ?

7) Does Mortimer McMire ever rest? You could watch the following smileys till the cows come home... and he's still moving!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortvort.gif[/img] (Lets not get started with keen [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img] )

More Coming Soon!!!

-- NAJAWA --

title: Hi Najawa!
content:
Najawa, I know the answers to your questions.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img]

1. I'm not sure, just assume it's your favorite brand.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]
2. I think so.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-disguised.gif[/img]
3. It's a new shirt![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] (I guess he got it be cause he got tired of pink?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] )
4. If you ever see him in band class, it auto-maticaly means yes.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]
5. Could be, but I'd rather not jump to conclusions in this situation.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img]
6. I assume it's some guy from the bahamas.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rasta.gif[/img]
7. These smilies [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortvort.gif[/img] prove that he never rests.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Now for my questions.

1. Why is the dopefish so impolite?(burp. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] )
2. Does [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] + [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] = [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] ?
3. Does [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] + [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] = [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-spotkeen.gif[/img] ?
4. What's up with this smilie [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-celtic.gif[/img] ?

I'll come up with more questions later.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: hehehe
content:
Nice FAQ!!!

Just one problem; i disagree:

"8.) 4. What's up with this smilie ?


Keen is a 'keen' football fan. He doesn't support the Packers you know."

Nope: The blaze family (Origionaly called Wolfstien, before Mr. Blaze went into show-biz) Keen's great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great, great grandma came from Ireland, and Married Mr. Bob Wolfstien. Keen is celebrating his celtic herritage, and that is the closest he can get before he starts messing with druidry, and witchcrap.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Help me find Commander Keen Game
content:
To all Commander Keen enthusiasts out there, please help me. In the early to mid 1990's I remember playing a version of Commander Keen. He was in his back yard with his pogo stick and would jump on the slugs to squish them. He went down a hole and would do the same. I believe he went to the pyramids and a mine and under the ocean. These are the only scenarios I remember from this versin of the game.

Can somebody please tell me the name of that game and version. I just do not recall and I think I am lookin in the wrong area.

Please email me at: georgeph38@yahoo.com

I would greatly appreciate this.

Thank you in advance,

George!

title: Re: Help me find Commander Keen Game
content:
Thanks for that FAQ LL, I learned a lot new Keen facts I didn't know of before.-----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Help me find Commander Keen Game
content:
georgeph38: There is no official Keen game like this, so if it exists then it might be a mod or fangame in the [url=http://dosclassics.com/keen/dl.php]Keen downloads page[/url] on DOS Classics. Look in the Mods and Fangame sections.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Help me find Commander Keen Game
content:
Hey Grafix, you listen to Lemon Demon too?

Grelphy; this was a fangame released very early on indeed, it had its own engine written in Basic and ripped graphics. I had it once, but had a very hard time playing it and never got past the yard [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img] oB. I don't think this community ever had anything to do with it at all.

*sigh* the memory of fangames past...A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
